Class Cat

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • SuperSmoothMover
        • Cat
  • public abstract class Cat
extends SuperSmoothMover
    The abstract superclass for cats. Contains all necessary methods for it's subclasses (aside from BossCat, which has some extra functionality).

    Has an empty constructor because each cat subclass sets its own health, speed, type, etc.

    All cats have:

    - Health (and a corresponding health bar)

    - Speed

    - Sprites

    Version:
    June 2022
    Author:
    Thomas Yang, Angus Feng

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        Checks if the cat has been hit by a projectile from a tower and removes the cat if it is off the world or has no more HP.
        Overrides:
        act in class greenfoot.Actor

      • moveAlongPath

        protected void moveAlongPath​(int speed)
        A method that allows the cat to move along the path by using a rotation variable to see which way the cat is going.

        After a set counter, the cat will start to check if there are any more path squares in the direction it is moving. If there aren't any, it will check around itself for any available path squares to move onto. If it does not find any, that means that the cat is at the end of the world so it will remove itself and damage the player.

        Parameters:
        speed - Speed of the cat moving along the path - allows different cats to move at different speeds.

      • addedToWorld

        public void addedToWorld​(greenfoot.World w)
        Adds an hp bar object to follow every cat added to the world
        Overrides:
        addedToWorld in class greenfoot.Actor
        Parameters:
        w - The world that the cat and statbar are added to.

      • gettingHit

        public void gettingHit()
        Method that checks if the cat has been hit by a projectile from the towers - If it has, remove the bullet and damage the cat

        If the cat is a BossCat, it will take triple the damage

      • damage

        public void damage​(int damage)
